other_tests.findings: A neuropathic process affecting small-caliber sensory nerve fibers.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Resolved burning sensation three months after discontinuation of atorvastatin.

other_tests.findings: Presence of an echogenic density (vegetation versus thrombus) attached to the mitral valve.
Confirmation of fungal endocarditis due to Scopulariopsis species.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient continued to receive intravenous caspofungin after discharge.

other_tests.findings: Reduction in proteinuria in patients with idiopathic membranoproliferative glomerulonephritis after treatment with spironolactone.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Proteinuria increased upon discontinuation of spironolactone; marked reduction upon retreatment.
